description: Long-Stay National Visa (Type D) for Employment. Requires a valid work contract or permit. Optimized for Indian applicants.

meta.max_stay: Duration of Work Contract (Converted to Residence Permit)
meta.min_funds_requirement: Salary as per contract must meet minimum wage standards

documents.title: Original Passport & Copies
documents.description: Valid for at least 12 months. Must have 2 blank pages. Include 2 sets of photocopies.

documents.title: 3 Biometric Photographs
documents.description: 35x45mm, white background, 80% face coverage, matte finish.

documents.title: Work Contract / Offer Letter
documents.description: Signed contract stating job title, salary, duration, and employer details.

documents.title: Work Permit / Authorization
documents.description: Official approval from the country's labor ministry (if applicable).

documents.title: Professional Qualifications
documents.description: Degrees, diplomas, and certificates relevant to the job.

documents.title: Incoming Travel Insurance
documents.description: Medical coverage of â‚¬30,000 valid for at least the first 3 months.

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Rental agreement or hotel booking for the initial period.

documents.title: Police Clearance Certificate
documents.description: PCC issued by the Passport Seva Kendra (PSK) or Regional Passport Office (RPO). Local police station PCC is usually NOT accepted.

steps_flow.title: Secure Job Offer
steps_flow.description: Get a signed contract from an employer in the Schengen country.

steps_flow.title: Work Permit Approval
steps_flow.description: Employer applies for labor authorization (if required).

steps_flow.title: Apply for Visa
steps_flow.description: Submit National Visa application at the Embassy/Consulate/VFS.

steps_flow.title: Travel & Residence Permit
steps_flow.description: Enter the country and apply for a Residence Permit within 3 months.
